key.name: remove-suspend-button
key.summary: Yes? OK.. Turn ON if you wish to remove suspend Item from system's menu.

key.name: remove-power-button
key.summary: Yes? OK.. Turn ON if you wish to remove powerOff Item from system's menu.

key.name: show-gnome-tweaks
key.summary: (If Gnome-Tweaks is Installed..) Yes? OK.. Turn ON to show Gnome-Tweaks in the system's menu.
